Package index

Core Workflow

Main functions for running MOSAIC simulations

run_LASER() run_laser()
Run LASER Model Simulation
run_MOSAIC() run_mosaic()
Run MOSAIC Calibration Workflow
make_LASER_config()
Create a Configuration File for LASER
sample_parameters()
Sample Parameters from Prior Distributions
check_dependencies()
Check Installed R and Python Dependencies for MOSAIC
install_dependencies()
Install R and Python Dependencies for MOSAIC
set_root_directory()
Set Root Directory
get_paths()
Generate Directory Paths for the MOSAIC Project

Get Pre-configured I/O Settings
